price: 9. (Dialah) Tuhan timur dan barat, tidak ada Tuhan (yang berhak disembah) selain Dia, maka jadikanlah Dia sebagai pelindung.
arabic: رَّبُّ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبِ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذۡهُ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: rabbu al-mashriqi wal-maghribi lā ilāha illā huwa fa-ittakhidh'hu wakīlan
